Comment: You forget that he has adivsors and vested interests.  Elon for instance seems to be very much attempting to create what his [grandfather](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joshua_N._Haldeman) (lovely chap...) was after with the technocracy movement he was part of and which wanted a North America that looked like [this](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Technocracy_movement#/media/File:BRM4117-Technate-of-America-1940_lowres2-3000x2088.jpg).  I'm also utterly certain that he was letting his inner circle of backers know when he was going to mess about with tariffs so they could make a killing on the stock market and that he honestly believes that tariffs are basically protection money that he can demand as the biggest bully on the block.  >For every other President, from Kennedy to Taft to even Nixon knew the office was more important than a period of "look at me, how great I am" opportunity.  His entire life has been about him and what he wants and instead of being left a laughing stock Hollywood actually decided to make his delusions a reality TV series and create an entire mythology around him that he has zero reason to disbelieve. He thinks everyhting he does works out for him because everything he's ever done has done and he's too stupid to notice when he's being used.
Author: Mein_Bergkamp
